concise_definition: n. 所有权, 拥有, 所有制

definitions.explanation_en: The state or fact of owning something, including legal rights and responsibilities over property, assets, or resources.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指拥有某物的状态或事实，包括对财产、资产或资源所享有的法律权利与责任。
definitions.example_en: The ownership of the land was transferred to the new developer after the sale.
definitions.example_cn: 交易完成后，这块土地的所有权被转让给了新的开发商。

definitions.explanation_en: A sense of personal responsibility or investment in something, often used in contexts like work, projects, or relationships.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指对某事物（如工作、项目或关系）所持有的个人责任感或投入感，强调主动担当。
definitions.example_en: She showed strong ownership of the project, ensuring every detail was completed on time.
definitions.example_cn: 她对这个项目表现出强烈的责任感，确保每个细节都按时完成。

definitions.explanation_en: The system or structure by which property or resources are owned, especially in economic or political contexts (e.g., private ownership vs. public ownership).
definitions.explanation_cn: 指在经济或政治语境中，财产或资源的拥有方式或制度，如私有制与公有制。
definitions.example_en: The debate over ownership of natural resources continues to divide policymakers.
definitions.example_cn: 关于自然资源所有权的争论仍在使政策制定者产生分歧。

comparison.analysis: “Possession” (占有) 强调对物品的实际控制或持有，但不一定包含法律权利。例如，偷来的东西你可能“拥有”它，但不具有“所有权”。而 “ownership” 是法律上确认的、可主张的权利。
“Control” (控制) 指对某物的支配或管理能力，但不必然意味着拥有。例如，经理可以控制公司资产，但未必是其所有者。“Ownership” 则隐含最终决定权和受益权。
“Title” (所有权凭证) 是证明所有权的法律文件或权利依据，如房产证。它是所有权的外在表现形式，而 “ownership” 是其内在的法律状态。拥有 title 是证明 ownership 的方式，但两者不是同一概念。
